name: Cooking Avatar
description:
Cooking Avatar is a single-player third-person cooking adventure where the player goes on a journey to different elemental domains in order to collect ingredients and cook some ramen for lunch. 

Controls: 

  • WASD / Arrow Keys  - Move
  • Mouse - Look around/turn
  •  Space bar - Jump
  • Shift -  Run 
  • Adam Yassine : Gameplay scripter, Level Design
  • Britney Luong : Set Dresser, Level Design
  • Zach Gordon : Sound Designer, Level Design

*All art and  non-original  sounds came from the Unity Asset Store and FreeSound.org

To see more of the process for developing Cooking Avatar you can look at our devlog : https://cookingavatarblog.wordpress.com/
